Package com.bfo.netkeystore.server

Class SampleOnlineOTP

java.lang.Object
com.bfo.netkeystore.server.SampleOnlineOTP
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyAuthorization
public class SampleOnlineOTP extends Object implements KeyAuthorization
A simple Online OTP KeyAuthorization which could be used as the basis for a useful implementation just by overriding the "notify" method. Accepts the following parameters in the config file
  • expiry - expiry time of OTP in seconds (default is 30)
  • otplength - number of digits in OTP (default is 6)
  • maxsessions - max number of simultaneous OTPs by a principal for a single credential (default is 8)
